Enjoy the ultimate block puzzle experience with Block Blast Unblocked. Fit different shaped blocks into the grid, clear rows, and keep your board from filling up. Test your problem-solving skills and enjoy endless fun in this unblocked puzzle game!

Features of Block Blast Unblocked

  • Unblocked Access: Play at school or work without restrictions.
  • Brain-Training Gameplay: Improve logic and strategy skills.
  • Easy to Learn, Hard to Master: Simple mechanics but challenging levels.
  • Endless Puzzle Fun: Keep playing as long as you can manage the board.
  • No Time Limits: Play at your own pace and perfect your strategy.

How to Play Block Blast Unblocked

  1. Drag and drop blocks onto the grid.
  2. Fill complete rows or columns to clear them.
  3. Keep placing blocks strategically to prevent the board from filling up.
  4. Plan ahead to create space for incoming pieces.
  5. Play as long as possible and set a new high score!
